courseStudentDashboard.noMetrics: No metrics are available for you in this course yet.

exercisePerformance.title: Exercise Performance
exercisePerformance.info: This shows how well you did in each exercise as a percentage of the total points possible. You can also see the average score of all students to compare your performance with your peers.
exercisePerformance.noData: No scores are available for you in this course yet.

exerciseLateness.title: Exercise Lateness
exerciseLateness.info: This shows how much time you used to complete and submit each exercise as a percentage of the total time available. Compare your submission times with the average to see if you're earlier or later than most students.
exerciseLateness.noData: You have not submitted any exercises in this course yet.

judgementOfLearning.title: How would you rate your mastery?
judgementOfLearning.info: Rate how well you understand and can apply the skills from this competency. Artemis also provides a rating based on your performance to help you see where you stand.
judgementOfLearning.error: An error occurred while saving your rating.
